ABOUT US

At Habibi Makes restaurant, we pride ourselves on using only the freshest, locally sourced ingredients to create delicious and innovative dishes. Our menu features a wide variety of options, from classic comfort foods to contemporary creations. Our chefs have years of experience and a passion for food that is evident in every dish they prepare. We also offer a carefully curated selection of wines and craft beers to complement your meal. Whether you're looking for a casual dining experience or a special occasion, Habibi Makes restaurant is the perfect choice for you.
